metadata.name: The Universe Quiz Show 2022
metadata.description:
Congratulations! You've won "The Universe Quiz Show 2022"! All the sweat, blood, and tears were worth it. Give yourself a pat on the back and enjoy the result of your hard work.

This NFT proves that you were the WINNER of the quiz and gave your best to destroy your competition. Well done! We are proud of you.

Now you can show it to your friends and, in the future, it will be here for your grandchildren to see and to be proud of you... and their grandchildren... and their grandchildren... it's on-chain so it will stay here forever.
